name: Temperature Inc.
description:
You are hired to test a project from Mr. Celcius ! Use temperature changes to progress further in his project !

Made for Mini Jam 101 with limitation "Control The Environment". A collaboration between Stingby12 and Toombler.

Controls: 

  • Z is undo
  • R is restart
  • WASD or arrow keys for movement 
  • M is mute

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=81c7c0af422f27c8d5a3a9cb817b2a55

Puzzlescript Link: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=81c7c0af422f27c8d5a3a9cb817b2a55
